name: Hisuian Samurott
author: Oswaldo KATO
flavor_text: Hard of heart and deft of blade, this rare form of Samurott is a product of the Pokémon’s evolution in the region of Hisui. Its turbulent blows crash into foes like ceaseless pounding waves.

abilities.name: Wily Stance
abilities.effect: You must discard a card from your hand in order to use this Ability. Once during your turn, you may draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Dark Mastery
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.
